table.title: load average/min/max for all services (includes web, workers, jobs, scheduler, other)
table.searchString: index=heroku | timechart span="15m" avg(load_avg_5m) as avg, max(load_avg_5m) as max, min(load_avg_5m) as min by sourcetype

table.title: load average/min/max by application (web/workers)
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "(heroku|app) (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="(web|worker)" | timechart span="15m" avg(load_avg_5m) as avg, max(load_avg_5m) as max, min(load_avg_5m) as min by sourcetype

table.title: load avg/min/max load by web
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "heroku (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="web" | timechart span="3hr" avg(load_avg_5m) as "average load", min(load_avg_5m) as "min load", max(load_avg_5m) as "max load"

table.title: load average by web dyno
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "(heroku|app) (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="web" | timechart span="15m" avg(load_avg_5m) as avg by dyno

table.title: load avg/min/max load by workers
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "heroku (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="worker" | timechart span="3hr" avg(load_avg_5m) as "average load", min(load_avg_5m) as "min load", max(load_avg_5m) as "max load"

table.title: load average by worker dyno
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "(heroku|app) (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="worker" | timechart span="15m" avg(load_avg_5m) as avg by dyno
